title: Mum who was so fat she could 'barely walk' loses staggering nine stone
text:

A woman who was so fat she says she could barely walk has won a slimming award for her drastic weight loss.

Irish woman Bernie Finn shed 8st 12lbs off her frame and was named Unislimmer Of The Year for her efforts.

Bernie Finn, 36, of Gorey, County Wexford, won the prestigious title this week after her incredible transformation.

Before committing to the health drive just three years ago, Bernie weighed 18 stone 10lbs.

The mum-of-two said: “What doesn’t seem like long ago I could hardly walk and I felt so low, reports the Irish Mirror .

(Image: "irishphotos@mirror.co.uk" <irishphotos@mirror.co.uk>)

“All I can say to anyone reading this who is thinking about losing weight, it has changed my life. I am a completely different person now and feel like life is so exciting again.

“To look at me now, some people don’t recognise me. I look 20 years younger.

“Being overweight is tough, feeling self-conscious and in the way all the time, not being able to put on your socks or play with your kids.

“Every day was a struggle, life was exhausting.

(Image: Photocall Ireland)

“I now wake up feeling happy, positive and excited for the future. Now I love clothes, I have energy and feel good about myself.

“I never thought I would be here accepting this award.”

Beauty guru and fellow Unislim member Triona McCarthy chose the winner from the inspirational group of 12 finalists who between them have lost more than 70 stone.

The TV star congratulated all the finalists and told of the difficult choice she faced.

Triona said: “Meeting this year’s 12 finalists and hearing each of their individual stories has been an emotional roller coaster.

“I kept having to re-do my eye make-up from crying but it’s because I’ve been shedding tears of joy.

“You can see how each of these 12 finalists now look and, more importantly, feel absolutely amazing.

“They have all reached their personal weight goals through Unislim and have all completely changed their lives for ever.

“It was so hard for myself and Unislim MD Fiona Gratzer to pick a final overall winner from this inspiring group.

“However, in the end we had to go with the beautiful Bernie.

“She has come through such incredible odds and through her self-commitment, love of the balanced, holistic Unislim approach to weight-loss and the personal support of her Unislim leader, Bernie now looks and feels fabulous.”

The winner was announced at a glitzy fashion show in Debenhams in central Dublin.
description: Irish woman Bernie Finn weighed 18 stone 10lbs before she began shedding dress sizes
